div.div: Hey fans--if you are looking for a simple yet timeless way to display your favrite team pride, then try this hat on for size. With a structured fit, bold team colors and quality construction, this basketball Snapback Hat is the perfect addition to your growing collection of sports apparel.

b.span: 1. How do I find the item I want to buy?

p.span: Find on home page the category of the item you want to buy (in the category list on the top of the page below the site title), move your mouse to the category name, you will see a list of sub-categories. Choose the one your item belongs to, and you will to transferred to the product page. You can choose the item you want to buy here.

b.span: 2. How do I place an order?

p.span: After click the item you are looking for, select size and fill in quantity, then click Add to Cart. Review the items in your shopping cart. Enter coupons or discount codes if you have any. When you are ready, click Proceed to Checkout. Choose your check out method as guest or registered customer(registered customers can log in from the right page). Click Continue and you will be transferred to the payment page. Please indicate the destination for the product, the method of payment and the billing address. Review your order information. You may edit your address and payment information. Select "Process Order" to complete checkout. Do not forget to keep the order information in a secure place in case that you may need to check your order status.

b.span: 3. How do you send my purchased items?

p.span: When we received your payment, we will deal with your order within 24 hours.

b.span: 4. How long will the parcel arrive in our country?

p.span: After we ship it, ordinary the parcel will be delivery in 5-7 working days during all the post process. Well, due to unforeseen circumstances, the time will be last a little longer. Please do not worry about it.

If you are a registered member at our website, you may track your order using the "Order Inquiry" link. Or, our Customer Service can help you track your order. When we get the tracking number from the express company, we also can send it and the tracking link to track the parcel’s status.

b.span: 6. How do I find the items size fitting me?

p.span: You can find Size Chart below the Size Selecting field.

b.span: 7. How do I can change my order or cancel my order?

p.span: If you want to change it or cancel it, you can tell us before shipping.

b.span: 8. How do I return the items to your company?

p.span: If you want to return the items, you can let us know the reason and we will let you know our address.

b.span: 9. What payment methods do you accept?
10. How long can I get the customized Product?

span.style: color: rgb(85, 85, 85); font-size: 14px; font-family: "Times New Roman";

div.span: It usually takes 5 days to customize a jersey. Sometimes 3 days. Once the parcel is shipped, we will give you the tracking number.
